name: Survival: high resistance for death
description: Survival: High resistance For death - You're in an open world where monsters exist. You need to defend yourself to survive in this world. At the beginning of the game, you need to take a brick or an ax to extract resources: ores, trees, food. It turns dark at night, in the afternoon you need to have time to build a house and do consecration. Resources can be found: killing a monster, breaking a stone, cutting down a tree. In order to create many different things, you need to build tables. Good luck!
